author: wikier
msg: added the initial draft of the webpage for the tutorial at iswc2014

author: nick
msg: Patch from Matthias Krueger from TIKA-1322 - XMLParser opens a p tag at the start, so always close it (not just on valid files), to avoid triggering the SecureContentHandler depth check on multiple xml errors. This closes #9 from github

author: markt
msg: Correct regression in the fix for 56339 that prevented sessions from expiring when using clustering.

The effect of removing expiring = true; from the DeltaSession is that if parallel calls are made to expire() then there is a slightly greater chance of some of those calls blocking while the first completes. This is because expiring is now set to true a little later.
